title: slumberjack
author: slumberjack

content: BTCitcoin Cartoons Free Raffle Full!! Bitcoin Talk'ers,I've received great feedback on my 1st DIY Coin and I'm feeling generous...so I'm hosting a FREE RAFFLE for 1 Slumberjack Bitcoin Cartoon! Which cartoon do you win? Winner chooses any one on my site between numbers #8 and #70 (black + white only)https://www.bitcoincartoons.io/shopAll available toons can be found on display in the Shop. Find me on Twitter @ https://twitter.com/BitcoinCartoonsEach Cartoon comes with a signed Certificate of Authenticity.  P.S. I also do commissions!RULES- Choose a number between 00 - 50 (no random)- Requirements: Jr Member and up. Below Jr Member can participate if you have a Copper Membership- Last number of the hash of that block I choose will be the winner.- If the hash number falls between 51-99, I will re-role.- shipping fees : Paid by winner LLLLLEEETTS GET READY TO RAFFFFLLLLLEEEEEE!!LIST:00 - Saxoshi01 - Frank AlpenCoin02 - GazetaBitcoin03 - DirtyBirdE04 - zipreg05 - Real Duke06 - Crytocanuk07 - haloxon08 - Buchi-8809 - Mbitr 10 - Darker4511 - Mitchell12 - heisty13 - geophphreigh14 - Willi997415 - aoluain16 - liquidoptions17 - YodasRedRocket18 - FattCatt19 - doblezero20 - TheBeardedBaby21 - tldr-hodl22 - JanEmil23 - PeakDK24 - slimzak25 - Mopar Mining LLC26 - mole081527 - Hookzup128 - bct_ail29 - Remsjack30 - SatsLife31 - Gatorelf32 - PreciousMetapsICT33 - 2stout34 - krogoth35 - kryptowerk36 - -doubleU-37 - Dernoste38 - FontSeli39 - The_Crypto_Kid 40 - tweetious41 - bullrun2020bro42 - ragilab43 - cygan44 - PawGo45 - Bullion-n-BTC46 - owlcatz47 - markzellers48 - Koal-8449 - bitbollo50 - minerjonesAll slots full. Thanks to all for your entires / interest! BTC block:  741,903winner The_Crypto_Kid!
